titleStmt.title: The continuation of the actions, passages, and occurrences, both politike and polemicall, in the upper Germanie Historically brought downe, from the period of the last relation, till Aprill. Together with a various and intermixed historie, of what hath been done in Turky, Italy, France, the Netherlands, and elsewhere. Faithfully collected out of good and creditable originals and digested methodically, by the times, places, and actions.
Diatelesma. Part 2.
titleStmt.author: N. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe, J. Dawson, and others] for Nathanael Butter, and Nicholas Bourne,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 of five news tracts issued from 1636 to 1639, of which the last three are entitled "Diatelesma". "To the reader" of other parts signed: N.C.
"Purslowe pr[inted]. at least quires A-D; Dawson at least E-G"--STC.
Leaf G4 (p. 47-48) is cancelled; text is continuous.
Leaf A4r, line 17 ends "Title of." Variant: line ends "Historiæ".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
